pluggable.name: Helpify
pluggable.author: Morgante Pell
The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Helpify displays customizable help on the publish page.

help.value:
This will display a single customized help text blurb within the publish (edit) pages, in a similar fashion to the (?) drop downs seen for each plugin.

An example use: Helpful tips and reminders for people writing blog posts, and/or markup convention examples.
